long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Childcancer.org Shopping Button is a Chrome browser extension that notifies users when they visit an online merchant who will donate a portion of every purchase to this Childcancer.org program. 

The user may also visit Keaton Raphael Memorial Shop & Give site at http://childcancer.shoppinganddonation.com/ to find additional online stores that participate in this Childcancer.org program.
